definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Sign language service will also be provided at the public hearing.
sentences.chinese: 公聽會亦會提供手語服務。

sentences.english: Simultaneous interpretation and Hong Kong sign interpretation are available for Core Sessions.
sentences.chinese: 大會將於核心會議提供即時中英及手語傳譯服務。

sentences.english: Deaf children, mostly into learning sign language and writing deaf-mute began to grasp.
sentences.chinese: 聾啞兒童大都入了學，聾啞人開始掌握手語和書面語。

sentences.english: One interpreter handles American sign language.
sentences.chinese: 一個口譯員負責處理美國手語。

sentences.english: In the middle of the 1700s a Frenchman named Epee developed sign language.
sentences.chinese: 在1700年代中期法國人重劍發展了手語。

sentences.english: These signs are just a few of the abstractions which occur in American Sign Language.
sentences.chinese: 以下手語是從美國手語中的一點摘選。

sentences.english: These signs are just a few of the abstractions which occur in American Sign Language.
sentences.chinese: 以下手語是從美國手語中的一點摘選。

sentences.english: Hearing parents can communicate with their deaf child.
sentences.chinese: 聽人父母可以和聾兒童用手語溝通。

sentences.english: You should have received sign language training before you came here.
sentences.chinese: 早知道這樣，出國前你應該去接受一下手語的急訓。

sentences.english: ASL has different grammar and structure than English.
sentences.chinese: 美國手語與英語的語法和結構不同。

sentences.english: In the past decade research has revealed that Broca’s area also contains a representation of the hands.
sentences.chinese: 過去十多年的研究發現，布羅卡區也控制手語表達。

sentences.english: Koyama: I got my official certification in level 3 already and I want to keep challenging and studying.
sentences.chinese: 我拿到了我手語3級證書所以我想繼續學下去呢。

sentences.english: All the security check posts are staffed with sign language volunteers.
sentences.chinese: 每個安檢口都有手語志願者。

sentences.english: Epee developed a large number of vocabulary words for sign language.
sentences.chinese: 重劍開發了大量的手語詞彙。

sentences.english: Some studies (Acredolo and Goodwyn) show a connection between signing as a baby, and improved IQ scores.
sentences.chinese: 有研究表明嬰兒時學習手語對IQ的提高很有幫助。

definition: courseware (abbr. for 課程軟件|课程软件[ke4 cheng2 ruan3 jian4])
(Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
